channel.title: indieweb on Benjamin Neil
channel.description: Recent content in indieweb on Benjamin Neil

item.title: Not dead
item.description: Whats going on? It all started with finding a webring. I hadnt seen one since the mid 90’s and the accidental stumbling upon one was almost magical. If you’ve never had the pleasure, a web ring was this piece of tech that was largely social. It was a way of finding genres of websites you were interested in and daisy chaining between them. Largely this was before google owned search and the ‘little’ guys like alta vista were king.
